member.name: M:MtpsPrepTool.HtmlmarkupAddins.ValidateDownloadLink
member.summary: Helper method that checks to see if the user is connected to the internet, and if they are, further checks the validity of the document download link by verifying it accross the internet as a System.Net.WebRequest. If no connection is detected, then the document download link is only verified as not having unsupported character.
member.returns: 0 if all the validation is successful, otherwise -1

member.name: M:MtpsPrepTool.MainForm.InsertGuid(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.ArrayList@,System.String)
member.summary: Helper method that inserts GUID line at the specified location.
member.param: Insertion location within an HtmlTopic file
Line found with leading tab characters
Path to Html Topic file under processing
ArrayList for processing the Html Topic file
Specifies the old GUID applied from previous build
member.returns: The complete XML line containing the new GUID

member.name: M:MtpsPrepTool.MainForm.FindLinesForInsert(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Helper method that finds the appropriate line in Html topic file for where the GUID needs to be inserted into each Html topic file's Xml Data island. Added fix: Original GUIDs will be saved with each originally associated Html Topic file and in each .HxS help archive as a separate text file in the same location as each help archive. This will allow the assigning of each original GUID when a given help archive is rebuilt.
member.param: Name of the help archive being processed
Source path of the help archives
member.returns: 0 if inserts succeeded, otherwise -1

member.name: M:MtpsPrepTool.MainForm.Init(System.String,System.String[]@)
member.summary: Help method that initializes retrieval of the Help 2.0 Archives
member.param: Array of Help 2.0 HxS Archive absolute paths
member.returns: True if one or more Help 2.0 HxS Archive(s) were found, otherwise False

member.name: M:MtpsPrepTool.MainForm.ProcessHelpArchives(System.String)
member.summary: Processes the specifed source folder path containing HxS Help Archives by checking for 8-4-4-4-12 GUID inside of each of the Html Help topics within the Xml Data Island and for correct Art/Image formats and size. Please note that the Microsoft Help 2.0 SDK must be installed, and is explicitly checked for otherwise this tool will not succeed.

member.name: M:MtpsPrepTool.TopicGuidAsso.WriteXmlFile
member.summary: Writes out the topic-GUID associated data file and performs neccessary checking that both xml data file locations are identical and have neccessary file attributes.
member.returns: True if checking and write out succeeded, otherwise false

member.name: M:MtpsPrepTool.TopicGuidAsso.RemoveTopicData(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes a given Topic with its associated GUID at build time from the topic-GUID association data file.
member.param: Topic title to remove if in both data file locations, but not more than once in both locations
Associated GUID to remove in both data file locations, but not more than once in both locations
member.returns: True if removal succeeded, otherwise false

member.name: M:MtpsPrepTool.TopicGuidAsso.AddTopicData(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new Topic with its new GUID at runtime time to the topic-GUID association data file.
member.param: New static GUID to add with new Topic
member.returns: True if the topic data doesn't already exist in either data file (both in the archive and side by side with the archive), otherwise false if either the Topic title or the GUID already appear.

member.name: M:MtpsPrepTool.TopicGuidAsso.SynchronizationCheck
member.summary: Helper method responsible for checking that the data in a given help arhive and also side by side with the archive are identical.
member.returns: True if identical, otherwise false

member.name: M:MtpsPrepTool.TopicGuidAsso.UpdateXml(System.String)
member.summary: Helper method that finds the html topic file's original associated GUID in the xml and reinserts it if topic is unchanged, adds the html topic file with a new GUID if it is a new topic, or deletes the topic and associated GUID from the Xml data files if it is found that a topic was removed after rebuilding from help producer.
member.param: Path to html topic file from help producer rebuild
member.returns: True if updates succeeded, otherwise false

member.name: M:MtpsPrepTool.TopicGuidAsso.RemoveXmlDuplicates(System.String,System.Data.DataRow[])
member.summary: Helper method that removes topics and their associated AssetID GUID from the Xml Data files after having found the corresponding topic was removed from the Help Producing build output .HxS which is input to this tool.
member.param: Path to the last Html Topic File in \TestOutput\html
DataRow array from last select statement in UpdateXml()
member.returns: Remaining DataRow array set after removal operation

member.name: M:MtpsPrepTool.TopicGuidAsso.ResynchronizeData
member.summary: Helper method responsible for rebalancing Xml data files after the data file checks provided by SynchronizationCheck() do not succeed.
